description: types of images allowed for upload
tooltip for vote buttons when the entry/comment was already downvoted
defaultMessage: Usted votó en contra con peso {weight}

description: tooltip for vote buttons when the entry/comment was already upvoted
defaultMessage: Usted votó a favor con peso {weight}

description: tooltip for collect button for the situation when a user cannot collect Essence for his entry
defaultMessage: Sólo puede recolectar Esencia si su puntaje de entradas es positivo

description: tooltip for collect button for the situation when a user cannot collect Essence for his vote
defaultMessage: Sólo puede recolectar Esencia si su voto está alineado con la mayoría (ejemplo, votaste a favor y su puntaje de entradas es positivo)

description: Essence was collected for an entry/vote
collect essence from a published entry or vote

defaultMessage: {count, number} {count, plural, one {comment} few {comments} many {comments} other {comments}}

description: a draft is an entry that wasn't published yet (the data is only kept locally)

defaultMessage: {count, number} {count, plural, one {draft} few {drafts} many {drafts} other {drafts}}

description: validation message for entry with no content
defaultMessage: ¡No puedes crear un artículo sin contenido!

description: Error message requiring at least one tag
defaultMessage: Debes añadir al menos una etiqueta

description: Error message shown when excerpt is too long
defaultMessage: El fragmento no debe de rebasar los 120 caracteres

description: label for load more replies button
label for local version of an entry
Message to show when new comments were published
defaultMessage: {count, number} new {count, plural, one {comment} few {comments} many {comments} other {comments}}

description: placeholder for empty latest entries list
entry subtitle for reading older versions
defaultMessage: Está ahora leyendo una versión más vieja

description: estimated time to read an entry (e.g. 10 min read)
confirmation message when reverting a draft
defaultMessage: ¿Está seguro de querer revertir el borrador?

description: button label for starting a comment from a highlight
validation message in case of missing title field
defaultMessage: El título no debe de ser vacío

description: tooltip for vote button in pending state (waiting for vote transaction to be mined)
vote percentage distribution between downvotes and upvotes
defaultMessage: Votos a favor - {upvote}% · Votos en contra - {downvote}%

description: tooltip for vote button for your own comment
defaultMessage: No puedes votar por tu propio comentario

description: voting period for an entry has ended
defaultMessage: El periodo de votación ha culminado

description: disclaimer message for votes when voting period has ended
defaultMessage: Los usuarios pueden votar aún en la entrada, pero el maná quemado para estos votos no puede ser recolectado por el autor o por los votantes.

description: number of words in an entry
defaultMessage: {words, number} {words, plural, one {word} few {words} many {words} other {words}}

description: input placeholder for writing a comment
placeholder for writing a reply to someone {name}
